title: Bel Kaufman Took Us 'Up The Down Staircase'
teaser: Bel Kaufman was a public school teacher who revealed  what the New York public schools were really like. She died Friday, in Manhattan, at the age of 103. NPR's Scott Simon has this remembrance.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
